scenes.background: You decide to help with the report, but you'll need support. [Bob] speaks up.
scenes.description: [Bob] says, 'We can assist, but that might delay the presentation. Are you sure it's the best approach?'

options.text: Let's focus on the report first; we can handle the presentation after.
options.analysis: You show strong self-regulation and social skills, but emotional perception is lower as you prioritize the report.

options.text: I agree, we should prioritize the presentation and deal with the report afterward.
options.analysis: You balance your social skills and motivation well, but your empathy could be seen as lacking by not fully taking on the report.

options.text: Maybe we can multitask; I'll start on the report while you work on the presentation.
options.analysis: You show good emotional perception and empathy, but may struggle with motivation due to the unexpected task.
